meta.title: Form Checkbox
meta.description: Custom checkbox input and checkbox group to replace the browser default checkbox input, built on top of semantic and accessible markup. Optionally supports switch styling.

Sets the 'aria-invalid' attribute value on the wrapper element. When not provided, the 'state' prop will control the attribute

slots.name: first
slots.description: Slot to place b-form-checks so that they appear before checks generated from options prop
